settings.Name: Marmara
settings.Description: The Propontis (Sea of Marmara) connects the Pontus Euxinus (Black Sea) to the Aegean Sea, and seperates Asia Minor from Thrace. To the south-west lies the Hellespont (Dardanelles), at the entrance of which the ancient city of Ilium (Troy) once stood. To the north-east lies the Bosporus Thraciae (Bosporus strait) where in time the Greek city of Byzantium would be founded, later to become the capital of the great Byzantine Empire under the new name of Constantinople. Players start on fertile land with adequate resources.
